Package Application

Class Flux

java.lang.Object
Application.Flux
Direct Known Subclasses:
FluxFiltre
public class Flux
extends java.lang.Object
La classe Flux permet la creation de flux

Guillaume

    • equals

      public boolean equals​(Flux myFlux)

      Returns:
